__e: Well, I don't like your number, and I don't need to be analyzed.
And when they find out differently, then they get sick and they have to be analyzed, eh?
Cos the brain might enjoy breaking' 'em down and that, but the heart, the heart ain't concerned.
If we wait, they'll have analyzed the gun and the whole area will be closed down.
We've analysed the situation and there is literally nothing we can do to help. Nothing.
The lab boys analyzed the photo I sent?
It was just the lab, they found trace elements of this drug this sonofabitch is using.
And doesn't it make so much sense? You examine a situation, you plan a course of action, you execute it.
